message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $10,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $7,500 is too low. This product offers significant value. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. How about we try $7,750?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be frank, I can't go any lower than $8,500 and still make this worthwhile. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but $8,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,200, but that's my absolute limit. Can you meet me at that price?
